医院枪支预防计划可能会被美国资助Crossfire捕获七年前，埃里卡·格林（Erica Green）通过Facebook帖子得知她的兄弟被枪杀了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/hospital-gun-violence-prevention-programs-may-bebe-be-be-becroun多https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/hospital-gun-violence-prevention-programss-may-bebe-be-be-beught-in-us-funding-crossfire.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B401A92D-C0A1-4A9C-AEB5-446E81DF276F Thu, 13 Mar 2025 12:14:01 -0400 Hospital gun-violence prevention programs may be caught in US funding crossfire
二萜在脑损伤后的再生神经元中显示出希望由生理学教授佩德罗·努涅斯·阿贝德斯（PedroNúñez-Abades）和卡门·卡斯特罗（Carmen Castro）协调的塞维利亚大学和加装大学的研究人员证明，二萜的使用有助于在受创伤性伤害受损的大脑区域中与新神经元重生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/diterpenes-show-promise-in-nererating-neurons-neurons-after-fer-brain-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/diterpenes-show-promise-in-nererating-neurons-neurons-after-after-fer-brain-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7883cb8-347d-476d-476d-8bd2-13350d149f09 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 11:55:00 -0400 Diterpenes show promise in regenerating neurons after brain injury
碳纳米管传感器的突破可能会彻底改变健康监测在一项新的研究中，研究人员生产的纳米材料可以用于开发未来医疗保健的更准确的传感器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/breakthrough-in-carbon-nanotube-sensors-could-could-revolutions-health-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/breakthrough-in-carbon-nanotube-sensors-could-could-revolution-health-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb48e488-3cc5-4767-9b3a-437a2602feec Thu, 13 Mar 2025 11:05:00 -0400 Breakthrough in carbon nanotube sensors could revolutionize health monitoring
芬兰研究揭示了体育锻炼与寿命之间的复杂联系体育活动被视为延长人类寿命的一种方式，但是芬兰双胞胎研究发现，体育活动对寿命的好处可能并不像以前认为的那样简单。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/finnish-study-reveals-complex-complex-link-bet-phect------- physical-physical-activity-activity-and-activity-and-longevity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/finnish-study-reveals-complex-complex-link-bet-phes-physical-physical-activity-activity-activity-and-longevity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5bde424-5984-4b3e-8a49-70233a4eebce Thu, 13 Mar 2025 10:37:22 -0400 Finnish study reveals complex link between physical activity and longevity

研究人员开发了新化合物来治疗脱发Areata由IOCB Prague的Pavel Majer博士领导的研究小组与Johns Hopkins University的Barbara Slusher和Louis Garza的实验室合作开发了一种化合物，可以潜在地治疗自身免疫性疾病脱发Areata，这会导致脱发导致毛发损失，从而导致鲍德贴片的形成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/researchers-develop-new-new-compound-to-to-to-to-to-treat-alopecia-areata.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/researchers-develop-new-new-new-compound-to-to-to-to-to-treat-alopecia-areata.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eda6ae05-3d36-4666-b415-d22952e461b7 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 08:07:00 -0400 Researchers develop new compound to treat alopecia areata
新的牙科处理旨在抵抗牙齿腐烂和酸侵蚀伦敦玛丽皇后大学的研究人员使用尖端的土木工程技术，开发了一种新的牙科治疗，以保护牙齿免受腐烂和酸侵蚀，用于创建第四桥涂料。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/new-dental-worteatment-demanded-to-combat-tooth-tooth-decay-decay-and-acid-erosion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/new-dental-woreatment-designed-to-combat-tooth-tooth-decay-decay-and-acid-acid-erosion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=635c701d-a9f2-49df-8177-30841f147152 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 08:01:20 -0400 New dental treatment designed to combat tooth decay and acid erosion
